tool.name: Upload Reference
tool.description: Upload a reference archive to HDFS.
tool.command: upload_reference.py ## URI for reference is in the last column. We find which ## element of the tables matches the item selected (if part) ## pick out the last field ${ (row[-1] for row in $__app__.tool_data_tables[ 'bwa_indexes' ].get_fields() if str(row[0]) == str($reference)).next() } ## $path_output #if $destination: $destination #end if

param.name: reference
param.label: Reference index
param.help: The reference to be copied to HDFS for use with Seal tools.

tool.help: Use this node to ensure the selected reference is uploaded to HDFS so that it can be used by Seqal.
